briefTitle: Correlation of Solitary Dilated Duct at Mammography With Ultrasonography and Anatomopathological Findings
officialTitle: Evaluation of Solitary Dilated Duct Visualized by Mammography in Correlation With Ultrasonography and Anatomopathological Findings.
conditions: Mammary Duct Ectasia of Unspecified Breast, Mammographic Findings, Female
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Abnormal histological finding at breast biopsy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Identification of a solitary dilated breast duct at mammography

Exclusion Criteria:

* Previous breast surgery at same side of detection of dilated duct
